spec_data.Name: perl-Email-Valid
spec_data.Description:
This module determines whether an email address is well-formed, and optionally,
whether a mail host exists for the domain or whether the top level domain of
the email address is valid.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 11:17:45 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Check validity of internet email address
